word: Jesus continued, "Therefore take no thought, saying, What shall we eat? or, What shall we drink? or, Wherewithal shall we be clothed? (For after all these things do the Gentiles seek); for your Heavenly Father knoweth that ye have need of all these things." Then spreading out his hands toward the surrounding multitude, he said, "But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you."
